text: Noah Cyrus may not be as famous as her older sister, Miley, but the next few months could be a gamechanger for the budding singer. The 17 - year - old will join Carly Rae Jepsen and Purity Ring as the opening acts for Katy Perry on the North American leg of her Witness tour, which kicks off in Montreal Sept. 19. The schedule was pushed back “ due to unavoidable production delays, ” Perry revealed Thursday via social media.
